gameDetails.name: Dominion: Envoy Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
This promo card was given to the visitors of the gameplay festival in Vienna in 2008. It's the first additional card for the German edition of Dominion. The English edition was distributed by The BGG Store itself, along with the Black Market Promo Card, beginning in March 2009.

Text:




    
        Envoy (Action - Cost 4 [coin])

    
    
         Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

    


Revised text (2017):




    
        Envoy (Action - Cost 4 [coin])

    
    
         Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one. Discard that one and put the rest into your hand.

    


Part of the Dominion series.
